Job Title: Senior Software Engineer - Full Stack Development
Job Description: Roles and ResponsibilitiesWhat will I be doing?- Responsible for full software lifecycle, system design and development of front-end & back-end systems- Writing high quality code, participating in code reviews, designing/architecting systems of varying complexity and scope, and creating high quality documentation supporting the design/coding tasks- When you code, you reflect and seek feedback on design choices and trade-offs you make- Identify libraries and technologies worth experimentation- Build innovative solutions from scratch and liaise with architects and engineers to build solutions- As a senior member of the team, you'll use both technical and relational skills to lead large-scale projects to completion- Identify areas of improvement in our frameworks, tools, processes and strive to make them better- Own and commit to all your work, and be accountable for your results- You will be mentoring and teaching other team members.
UG: B.Tech/B.E. in Any Specialization, BCA in Computers, B.Sc in Any Specialization
